name: Damaged in Transit (itch)
description:
Description

Split your attention in Damaged In Transit!

This mind-bending action-puzzler will leave you cross-eyed! Juggle your two drones and help them deliver their precious cargo. Spikes, pitfalls, flamethrowers and enemy robots will threaten your shipment as you trek across 125 levels of desert oases, coal mines, ports, oil rigs, and the core of the Earth!!! Deftly manage the map and use the items you find to open pathways and keep the drones safe.

Embrace the miracle of automated delivery!

Features
  • Single Player - Juggle both drones by yourself.
  • Local Co-Op - Juggle both drones with a friend! Each player takes half the controls.
  • 125 levels over 5 Worlds
  • Spikes!
  • Lava!
  • Traps!
  • Spikes!
  • Evil Robots!
  • More Spikes!
Developers

Wyatt Yeong - Lead Design
Diego Garcia - Visuals
Greg Heffernan - Music & Sound Design
